Articles.Content:
Just finished this up a couple days ago. I've made a few SS2 replicas in the past, but the SP+ parts have really helped with aesthetics and accuracy.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Downloads:

The whole Tier 1b assembly, SS2 and WK2: http://www./view/jc42a8rrzyrzzsd/Tier_1b.craft

SpaceShipTwo on its own: http://www./view/lb25rpo9cr01v8g/SpaceShipTwo.craft

WhiteKnightTwo on its own (with a sorta hidden docking port in the cetner to control from): http://www./view/6bgvgolldc4gae7/WhiteKnightTwo.craft

And a WhiteKnightTwo subassembly in case you want to carry your own payload: http://www./view/kx4px3i81n9eulk/WhiteKnightTwo_Subassembly.craft

SpaceShipTwo gets a little unstable towards the end of its burn and wants to nose down. I'd suggest throttling back when fuel starts running low.

Comments/suggestions/constructive criticism welcome. Enjoy!

Edited November 8, 2014 by ethan829
o7 i salute to the brave man who was killed in that horrible accident....nice replica
Nah I don't like it honestly, the MK3 cockpit kills the mood.

Nah I don't like it honestly, the MK3 cockpit kills the mood.

You think so? This is maybe one of the only real uses I've found for it. I thought it matched the real thing pretty well. I just wish the Mk. 3 cockpit internals mod had been maintained.

Rep to you sir.

I know it's tricky to make it work.
Wonder what happens if the feathers supply prematurely in FAR with aero failures....
